name: Broken Dimensions
description:
Take on the shoes of the protagonist as he is mysteriously teleported to an old abandoned lab in this First person platformer game. Find out the secrets of the lab... Gain access to secret experiments , gaining abilities that may help you escape.

As you go from one place to another you gain powers allowing you to double jump, dash and wall run. Acquire these skills and master them during the course of game as lab shows no mercy.

Some thing in the lab affected gravity and physics of the environment... creating a perfect but a very hard place to platform your way out... so build those skills goood.
